explains: adv. 在那里；在那边；在那点上
wordGroup: out there 到战场，在那里
get there 到达那里；取得成功，实现目标
here and there 各处，到处
up there 在那里；在天上
down there 在那儿（下方）；去那里
all there 头脑清醒的；机敏的
there you go 这边请；这下你会懂了；你又来这一套
there and then 当场就；当时当地
neither here nor there 不相干；与题目不相干；不重要
near there 不远，在那附近

sentences.en: There may be other worlds out there.
There were six or seven of us there.
sentences.cn: 我们约有六、七个人在场。

sentences.en: There were thousands of people there.
